sections.heading: Effect of timely recordation of notice of reinscriptionA notice of reinscription that is recorded before the effect of recordation ceases continues that effect for ten years from the date the notice is recorded
sections.text: Acts 2005, No. 169, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2006; Acts 2005, 1st Ex. Sess., No. 13, ยง1, eff. Nov
